summary: Complete testing of Maquinaria CRUD module and Tratamientos integration with aplicador_nombre and maquina_id fields. Backend APIs 100% pass rate (14/14 tests). Frontend UI fully functional.

issues: Console hydration warnings caused by visual editor metadata injection (span inside tr/th/td/select) - cosmetic only, does not affect functionality

passed_tests: Backend: Admin login (200 OK)
Backend: Maquinaria - List returns maquinaria array and total
Backend: Maquinaria - Create with all fields (nombre, tipo, marca, modelo, matricula, num_serie, año_fabricacion, capacidad, estado, observaciones)
Backend: Maquinaria - Get single by ID
Backend: Maquinaria - Edit (PUT) works with updated data
Backend: Maquinaria - Filter by tipo works
Backend: Maquinaria - Filter by estado works
Backend: Maquinaria - Delete and verify 404
Backend: Tratamientos - Create with aplicador_nombre field
Backend: Tratamientos - Create with maquina_id populates maquina_nombre
Backend: Tratamientos - List includes aplicador_nombre and maquina_nombre
Backend: Tratamientos - Update maquina_id updates maquina_nombre
Frontend: Maquinaria page loads with navigation in sidebar
Frontend: Maquinaria table displays 2 existing machines (Tractor Principal, Pulverizador Cuba 1000L)
Frontend: Maquinaria filters panel with Tipo and Estado dropdowns
Frontend: Maquinaria field configuration panel with 16 checkboxes (form + table)
Frontend: Maquinaria form has all fields: Nombre, Tipo, Marca, Modelo, Matrícula, Nº Serie, Año Fabricación, Capacidad, Estado, Observaciones
Frontend: Tratamientos table has Aplicador and Máquina columns
Frontend: Tratamientos form has Aplicador text input field
Frontend: Tratamientos form has Máquina dropdown with only Operativo machines
Frontend: Tratamientos field config has Aplicador and Máquina checkboxes
critical_code_review_comments: Console hydration warnings in tables are caused by visual editor metadata injection (span inside tr/th/td) - cosmetic only, not affecting functionality

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all Maquinaria CRUD operations, Tratamientos Aplicador/Máquina fields working)

seed_data_creation: Created test maquinaria and tratamientos during testing (cleaned up by cleanup tests)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Maquinaria module fully implemented and tested. Tratamientos form updated with aplicador_nombre (text input) and maquina_id (dropdown showing only Operativo machines). Backend automatically populates maquina_nombre from maquinaria collection when creating/updating tratamientos. localStorage keys: maquinaria_fields_config, maquinaria_table_config.

crud.create: POST /api/maquinaria - creates machine with all fields

new_fields.aplicador_nombre: Text input for applicator name (free text)
new_fields.maquina_id: Dropdown selector from maquinaria catalog (only Operativo machines)
new_fields.maquina_nombre: Automatically populated from maquinaria when maquina_id is provided

tratamientos_integration.backend_denormalization: maquina_nombre is denormalized from maquinaria collection for display purposes
